summary: Created 4 visualizations showing model performance: 1) Prediction accuracy comparison, 2) Residual analysis, 3) Categorical performance breakdown, 4) Temporal trend validation. All plots clearly distinguish given data (blue) from predictions (orange).
insights: Model shows strong performance (R²=0.89) with random residuals and trend-aligned predictions. Best accuracy for Rice-Kharif and Wheat-Rabi crops. Prediction for 2024-25 follows historical growth pattern.
